properties.name: jira.api.email
properties.description: Email for the account that will use the Jira API.

properties.name: jira.api.token
properties.description: API token to access the jira API.

properties.name: jira.api.uri
properties.description: The base URI for the JIRA api.

properties.name: solesonic.llm.intent.model
properties.description: Model to use for intent recognition.

properties.name: solesonic.llm.jira.url.template
properties.description: URL template for linking jira issues.

properties.name: solesonic.llm.jira.cloud.id.path
properties.description: The path to the Jira Cloud ID.

properties.name: atlassian.tokens.cache.enabled
properties.description: Enables in-memory caching of Atlassian access tokens to reduce network calls. Accepts true or false.

properties.name: atlassian.tokens.cache.ttl-seconds
properties.description: Time-to-live for cached Atlassian tokens, in seconds.

properties.name: atlassian.tokens.migration.enabled
properties.description: Enables one-time token migration tasks (e.g., moving or reformatting stored Atlassian tokens). Accepts true or false.
